StoryText: It's a 'wear what you like day' and %FirstName:NPC:1% is wearing exactly the same shoes as me!
Question: What should I do?

OptionText.Text: Say nothing - they're just shoes, aren't they?
Politely ask %FirstName:NPC:1% why %Pron:1:1% chose those shoes to wear.

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:NPC:1% mentions that we have the same shoes... and smiles. We both have great taste, don't we?
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FirstName:NPC:1% and I wore the same shoes to the 'wear what you like' day. Now we're bestest besties!

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:NPC:1% says %Pron:1:1% likes them. Oh yeah... well duh! You feel a little bit stupid! But if %FirstName:NPC:1% likes them, it proves that they are lovely shoes!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I asked %FirstName:NPC:1% why %Pron:1:1% wore her shoes. The amazing revelation was that %Pron:1:1% likes them! Still, it means we are more alike than I thought!

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:NPC:1% is really upset - %Pron:1:1% didn't copy you, and now she's upset! Why did you do that?
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Me and my big mouth - I upset my friend by accusing her of copying me.
